Package ru.nsu.yakovleva.logic.sprite.snake

Class Snake

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.yakovleva.logic.sprite.snake.Snake
All Implemented Interfaces:
Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
SnakeFx
public abstract class Snake extends Object implements Sprite
Represents the snake in the game.
